WorkItem.ClosedComment:
You should check other posts. This is not a bug, but a feature and is configurable. P is treated like this because many HTML pages used P like this, as this was actually a (powerful) feature of original HTML. Now that XML and XHTML exist, everybody assumes that this is an error, but it's not (in HTML 3.2).
Check the HtmlNode.cs file, and modify the ElementsFlags collection (or do it at runtime if you prefer)
